items.text: hoicked into the leg side! That's woken the crowd up - first boundary since the 8th over. Mushfiqur jumped down the track and slammed it in the air, and wide of Boult at deep midwicket. Boult made plenty of ground, but couldn't get there
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: nudged gently to leg
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: flicked down to fine leg, just the one
items.postText: Drinks come out onto the field, and on that note I'll hand back to Ankur
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: The dibbly-dobbly wibbly-wobbly style of de Grandhomme and the genuine pace of Ferguson from the other end has worked well for New Zealand.
items.text: length ball  but down the leg side, targeting Mushfiqur's rib cage with the leg gully in place but misdirected
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

items.text: length and angled across, beats Mushfiqur who is rooted to the crease expecting a short one, just fishes at it with his hands, tentative stroke
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: nearly works! Another quick short one, hurries onto Mushfiqur who fended at it awkwardly, lobbed up towards the leg gully but just eluded him despite the hang time the ball had
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: goes fuller and across Shakib and beats him outside off as he pushes at it meekly
items.shortText: Ferguson to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length on middle and leg this tinme, Shakib can't tuck it away and it nearly rolls back onto the stumps off the thigh pad
items.shortText: Ferguson to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: another quick, short one, Shakib sees this one early and ducks under, but he can't keep doing this forever, needs to find a way to score
items.shortText: Ferguson to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: a fast yorker on middle to finish, Shakib jams his bat down on it and squeezes it away towards square leg
items.shortText: Ferguson to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: the gentler pace of de Grandhomme from here and it's a length ball on middle, tucked away towards deep square leg with far greater comfort
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length on the pads, tickled to short fine-leg
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length on middle, tight bowling from de Grandhomme, who is playing his part perfectly, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length, angled across, steered to short third-man
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on the pads this time, tucks it away straight to short fine-leg
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Lockie Ferguson loves bowling fast. His favourite superhero is the Flash (for obvious reasons). Here's how he has added a cutting edge to the NZ attack
items.text: full on middle, driven to mid-on's left and they come through for one
items.shortText: Neesham to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Some respite for Bangladesh with Neesham coming on
items.text: short outside off, Mushfiqur pounces on it with a slashing blade, but straight to deep cover-point
items.shortText: Neesham to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length and angled in from around the wicket, Shakib waits for it before guiding it to third-man for one
items.shortText: Neesham to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, Mushfiqur runs it down to third-man for one
items.shortText: Neesham to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length angled across from over the wicket to the left hand batsman this time, Shakib pushes at it with his hands and gets a thick inside edge back to the bowler
items.shortText: Neesham to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short around the hip this time, doesn't rise as much but Shakib adjusts beautifully, goes low with his hands and bisects the two deep fielders with a controlled pull
items.shortText: Neesham to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: length on off, Mushfiqur opens the face and pushes it straight to point
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: slower ball outside off, waits for it and runs it down to third-man
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Nitish R: "NZ have to do well and ensure they take a wicket here very soon. Letting Shakib and Mushfiq play longer. even though stemming the run flow, may not work in favor of NZ. This is where South Africa lost the plot the other day. Santner should have a go at these two. "
items.text: length outside off, Shakib looks to drive on the up, gets it off the high part of the bat and straight to mid-off but they come through for a quick single
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
